column4: anyone on Hardy using amd64 and iwl3945 .. if you have it working please enlighten me :)
I got the compat-wireless package, and that made it work for me.  I am not running amd64, however
you might try this.  It worked for me.  http://linuxwireless.sipsolutions.net/en/users/Download
Thanks, I'll pass that along to my buddy on amd64 hardy
